name: Craft Owl
details: Art and Craft manufacturing to purchase products within quantities and implemented admins functionalities.
Database stores every important data and the client side functionalities work depending on that.
Used React Js, Firebase, React hook form, Tailwind & DaisyUI, JWT, MongoDb in backend.

name: Wild Wanderer
details: Freelance Photographer website to provide categorized services.
Stores data of every order and admin can filter out the services data through date and status.
Built in React Js and used Firebase, Tailwind and MongoDb in the backend.

name: Agronomy
details: An agro warehouse management project to store and modify the data of products.
Have security based on authentication and authorization and have end to end responsiveness.
Implemented CRUD operation and used React Js, Firebase, Tailwind, JWT.

name: Doctors Portal
details: Website for book a dentist appointment with date and time.
Have security based on authentication and authorization and have end to end responsiveness.
Implemented CRUD operation and used React Js, Firebase, Tailwind, JWT.

name: Genius Car Service
details: Have security based on authentication and authorization and have end to end responsiveness.
Implemented CRUD operation and used React Js, Firebase, Tailwind, JWT.

name: Good Readers
details: Review platform for readers build with react.
People can add review over a particular book with ratings it it.
Implemented react router for visiting page to page without reloading.
